bots.desc: Lists all bots of a client.

cleardm.desc: Clear all messages sent by the bot in your direct messages.

delete.desc: Delete a file or folder from your bot's directory.

dir.desc: View the directory structure of your bot.

git.desc: Sync a git repository to your bot for automatic updates.

help.desc: Lists all commands in the bot.

memoria.desc: Change the maximum RAM consumed by a bot.

mod.desc: Perform various functions related to the moderator system.

novoup.desc: Upload a bot using the configuration file .discloudconfig

planos.desc: View all available plans and their benefits.

removerbot.desc: Delete your instance by deleting all data and settings.

resetweek.desc: Reset the time your bot will turn off.

status.desc: View the status of a bot.

terminal.desc: Shows the terminal of your bot.
